page.title: 02TOURISM IN YORK.
page.content: Many people come to{York}for a holiday.The river attracts people wanting boat trips and there is an interesting walk with benches along the riverside.In the{Museum Gardens}is the{Yorkshire Museum},where there is a collection of natural history,and which is used to put on special exhibitions (at the moment we have the Romans),the ruins of{St.Mary's Abbey and St.Leonard's Hospital.An old observatory in the Gardens has been renovated and is now in use.Every four years York has a{Festival}and puts on perfomances of the{Mystery Plays}in the Gardens. Nearby,the{National Railway Museum holds some of the oldest and most famous locomotives in the country,including the Mallard and a replica of the Rocket.Other features include a lecture theatre and shops.
